Ashwinikumar
Kulkarni
Ph.D.

I am a research scientist at the Prof. Konopka Lab, Department of Neuroscience, UT Southwestern Medical Center. Using next-generation sequencing at single cell resolutions coupled with computational and machine-learning approaches, I am studying the complex gene regulatory networks to identify genomic signatures involved in neurodevelopmental diseases, sleep and circadian regulation.

know more
